data.subTitle: 跨域设置
data.content:
在vue.config.js中设置

module.exports = {
    devServer: {
        open: true,
        host: 'localhost',
        port: 8080,
        https: false,
        hotOnly: false,
        proxy: {//配置跨域
            '/api': {
                target: '请求地址/api/',
                ws: true,
                changOrigin: true,
                pathRewrite: {
                    '^/api': ''
                }
            }
        },
        before: app=>{}
    }
}
